sections.heading: operating property; assessment
sections.text: The Property Tax Administrator shall assess all operating property of the railroads and railroad corporations in the State of Nebraska as defined in section 77-602.SourceLaws 1903, c. 73, ยง 85, p. 413;Laws 1909, c. 111, ยง 1, p. 441;R.S.1913, ยง 6375;Laws 1921, c. 133, a

sections.heading: not exclude property situated more than one hundred feet from center of main track of road
sections.text: Chicago, B. & Q. R.R. Co. v. Box Butte County, 99 Neb. 208, 155 N.W. 881 (1915).
